alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 18 at 1:19PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Flood Advisory for Minor Flooding in Poor Drainage Areas for... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 515 PM MST. * At 119 PM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause minor flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will result in minor flooding in the advisory area. Up to one inch of rain has already fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Florence, Florence Junction, Magma, Queen Valley and Gold Camp.
info.instruction: Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small creeks and streams, country roads, farmland, and other low lying spots.
